text: Hagi ama'i mago'a Livae nagapinti'ma fore'ma hu'nazana, Libnikino, Libni nagare hu'za manizageno, Hebronimpinti'ma fore'ma hu'naza vahe'mo'za, Hebroni nagare hu'za mani'zageno, Maharimpinti'ma fore hu'naza vahe'mo'za Mahari nagare hu'za mani'zageno, Musimpinti'ma fore hu'naza vahe'mo'za Musi nagare hu'za manizageno, Kora nagapinti'ma fore'ma hu'naza vahe'mo'za Kora nagare hu'za mani'naze. Hagi Kohati'a Livae nagapinti ne' Amrami nefa'e.
